document.full_text: boston bruins forward brad marchand has been suspended two games by the nhl for his hit to the head of the columbus blue jackets' r.j. umberger, the league said on thursday.
document.title: bruins' marchand suspended two games for elbow to head
lines_and_colors: boston bruins forward brad marchand has been suspended two games by the nhl for his hit to the head of the columbus blue jackets' r.j. umberger, the league said on thursday.
